long_description: The Scott Foil 20 carbon road bike uses a highly aerodynamic design to optimize speed and efficiency in all road conditions, giving you an extra, speedy edge during races and endurance rides. Full-carbon frame is designed to maximize aerodynamic efficiency using foil-inspired tube shapes, all while offering a road racing geometry for exceptional handling. Additional frame highlights include carbon dropouts with replaceable hanger, oversized, stiff bottom bracket, tapered head tube and internal cable routing. All-carbon fork with tapered steerer ensures precision when carving turns at speed. Shimano 105 drivetrain confidently guides you through 20 speeds. Compact Shimano 105 crank is paired with an 11-25 cassette to give you a wide range of gearing. Syncros RR2.0 wheels spin on hubs using DT Swiss internals for lasting, smooth-spinning performance. Continental Grand Sport Race tires ensure light, fast-rolling performance and offer puncture protection to keep you rolling to the finish line. Please note: pedals are sold separately. Specs on the Scott Foil 20 carbon road bike are subject to change.
